name: Diesel The Pug Warrior
description:
In this new adventure RPG, you will be playing as Diesel. Trouble in the Kingdom of Everlyn has called the King to ask Diesel and his best friend Fred to join the army to fight off the evil Luna. Help Diesel fight off Luna and her forces and become the best warrior in all of Everlyn!

This game is designed to be an adventure RPG packed with story and comedy. This game also contains lots of easter eggs!

This Game Features:

A Big Boss Fight

An Original Story

Original Soundtrack

Original Art that is Pixel Art
